title: IIITDM Kurnool Jobs 2025 - Apply Online for 02 Project Associate Posts
description: The Indian Institute of Information Technology Design and Manufacturing Kurnool (IIITDM Kurnool) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Project Associate Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech in Electronics and Mechanical Engineering can apply for the IIITDM Kurnool Jobs 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online m...
